attributes.action: negotiate with FIFA to introduce video refereeing systems on goal lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fans from around the world pump their hard earned money into the pockets of club owners, shareholders etc, FIFA the governing body can see that video refereeing could change the balance of many games thus affecting the lives of millions of people everywhere. 
It is imperitive that the video referee is introduced to the game, a short 5-7 break is all that is needed to see if the their was an infringement regarding dubious goals, such as hand balls or did the ball cross the line.
It works in every other sport, it is time to make the change and bring football out of the dark ages and change this antiquated method of refereeing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
